marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Send news and offers to me by email

unsubscribe.title: You canceled your subscription
unsubscribe.description: You will no longer receive any cart reminders from us.

marketing.accept_sms_checkbox_label: Send news and offers to me by SMS

disclaimer.description_html: By subscribing via SMS, you agree to receive automatic and recurring marketing messages, including cart reminders, on the mobile number you enter. Giving your permission is not a condition of purchase. Answer "STOP" to unsubscribe. Answer "HELP" to get help. The frequency of messages varies. Message and data charges may apply. See the %{privacy_policy_link} and the %{terms_of_service_link}.
disclaimer.description_transactional_html: We'll send you proof of order and shipping updates via text message. To unsubscribe, answer "STOP". If you need help, answer "HELP". Message frequency varies and message and data charges may apply. See our %{privacy_policy_modal_link} and our %{terms_of_service_modal_link}.

marketing.post_accept_marketing_checkbox_label: You have signed up to receive offers and news by email

opt_in.visibility: Email open rates will be reported anonymously. The only information we'll see is whether you opened the email, to include in an aggregate open rate.

opt_out.opted_out_html: You have turned off email open tracking.
opt_out.visibility: We will not see if you have opened our emails.

no_longer_track.privacy_policy: After sending this email, we updated our Privacy Policy and no longer track the opening.

track.status_html: Email open tracking is reported in a report.
track.visibility: The only information we'll see is whether you opened the email, to include in a total open rate.

updated_policy.status_html: Email open tracking is reported in a report.
